news_header: The Ethical Council of Hospitality monitors industry compliance and addresses issues raised by housing companies.
news_text: The Ethical Council of Hospitality started its operations at the beginning of the year to oversee adherence to industry regulations. It provides a platform for housing companies to express grievances regarding hosting services. So far, the council has received seven requests, primarily concerning key management and financial oversight issues within hosting companies. The council aims to guide hosting practices and ensure compliance with established norms, offering warnings for non-compliance without imposing penalties. It has already resolved two requests, highlighting negligence in key management and financial reporting.
